mapper.sql: functionID, functionName, linkedUrl, parentID, orderNum, status
mapper.select: select f.functionID,f.functionName,f.linkedUrl,f.parentID,f.orderNum,f.status from agricultural_function f,agricultural_user u,agricultural_role r, agricultural_role_function rf,agricultural_user_role ur where f.functionID=rf.functionID and r.roleID=rf.roleID and u.userID=ur.userID and r.roleID=ur.roleID and f.`status` > 0 and u.userID=#{userID} GROUP BY f.parentID,f.orderNum

select f.functionID,f.functionName,f.linkedUrl,f.parentID,f.orderNum,f.status from agricultural_function f,agricultural_user u,agricultural_role r, agricultural_role_function rf,agricultural_user_role ur where f.functionID=rf.functionID and r.roleID=rf.roleID and u.userID=ur.userID and r.roleID=ur.roleID and f.`status` > 0 GROUP BY f.parentID,f.orderNum
select count(roleFunctionID) from agricultural_role_function rf where rf.roleID=#{roleID} and functionID=#{functionID}
